title: FS 3 N28's ....sold and thank you to all who emailed !!

posts.post_title: FS 3 N28's ....sold and thank you to all who emailed !!
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have the following 3  cards available. Would prefer to sell outright or would consider trading all three for a pre war 300 game winner in similar condition. All three cards have extensive scrapbook damage , but the Carruthers and Bennett cards actually present OK. Please email [url]paulmisuck@hotmail.com[/url] if interested.
Clarkson SOLD
Carruthers SOLD
Bennett SOLD



Thanks as always,

Paul
might b intrested in them could u do any better

Sure, within reason

Please send me an email @ [url]paulmisuck@hotmail.com[/url] and let's work something out

Regards,
Paul
